name: Cazadero Music Camp
description: At Cazadero Music Camp students develop technical ability, music comprehension, confidence, creativity and ensemble performance skill. Students are engaged in five hours of practice each day, they make rapid progress at camp. Cazadero’s core program consists of five hours each day of small and large group instruction in Orchestra, Jazz Ensemble or Concert Band. Also offered: Classical and jazz piano, and classical guitar, as well as an All Camp Choir for our Young Musicians and Middle School Ses
